attributes.action: death by dangerous driving  involving alochol/drugs should be murder charge
attributes.additional_details: death caused by driver or drivers under the influence of alcohol and or drugs should be  treated as murder and not the  extremely lesser charge of death by dangerous driving which means the offender gets a minimal sentence in a soft prison for averages 18-24 months  for the  taking of a life.......................I want a review of all driving offenses and sentences so that the punishment reflects the crime
